attributes.action: posthumously promote Lord  Nelson to Admiral of the Fleet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On this, the 250th anniversary of the birth of Lord Nelson, we believe that his great victory over the French and Spanish fleets at Trafalgar should be honored by posthumously promoting him to the highest rank in the British navy.

This would guarantee that our greatest naval hero will never be outranked by any naval officers past, present or future, truly honoring his memory and his legacy.

rejection.details: This has no point about Government policy.
reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
